arts.ttl: Official: Juventus vs. AC Milan starting XIs – one change from Napoli win
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Massimiliano Allegri has named the AC Milan side that will take on Juventus, and continuity is the key once again. Milan approach the game in good form and in good health. Rafael Leao returned last weekend with a cameo off the bench against Napoli, while Fikayo Tomori has passed a late fitness test after an […] The post Official: Juventus vs. AC Milan starting XIs – one change from Napoli win appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Pulisic drives Milan’s attack yet Juventus still a challenging barrier
arts.sum: Milan are preparing to face Juventus at the Allianz Stadium in Turin for Matchday 6 of the 2025/26 Serie A season. The Rossoneri, coached by Allegri, will take on Tudor’s side in a match expected to deliver plenty of drama. Both teams are in strong form, with Milan aiming to extend their winning streak. Juventus, […]

arts.ttl: MN: Curva Sud not present at Juventus-Milan due to protest – the reason
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher The Curva Sud will not be present to cheer on AC Milan at the Allianz Stadium on Sunday night as they are protesting about ticket prices. As MilanNews report, for yet another year, the Curva Sud Milano will not be traveling to Turin. The Rossoneri fans are continuing to protest over Juventus’s way of selling […] The post MN: Curva Sud not present at Juventus-Milan due to protest – the reason appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: ‘So many emotions’ – Juventus boss Tudor lays out expectations ahead of Milan clash
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Juventus head coach Igor Tudor has heaped praise on his compatriot Luka Modric, while also commenting on the battle with Massimiliano Allegri. The two biggest clubs in Italy renew their rivalry at the Allianz Stadium in a game that pits the side top of the league (Milan) against one that have not lost for 10 […] The post ‘So many emotions’ – Juventus boss Tudor lays out expectations ahead of Milan clash appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: A 230-minute goal drought: All the key stats ahead of Juventus vs. Milan
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Juventus and AC Milan will add another instalment of their historic rivalry on Sunday night when they face off in Turin. This fixture has been played 289 times and Juventus hold an advantage, with 89 wins against Milan’s 66. A whopping 73 of them have ended in draws, though, which tells its own story about […] The post A 230-minute goal drought: All the key stats ahead of Juventus vs. Milan appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: QS: ‘Prime Time’ potential – Pulisic at the centre of Allegri’s anti-Juventus plan
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Christian Pulisic is the man who will lead AC Milan into battle against Juventus, shouldering the responsibility of creating goals. As Quotidiano Sportivo recall, in the United States – where Pulisic hails from – they called Deion Sanders ‘Prime Time’, someone who starred in the NFL and MLB, and became known as the man for […] The post QS: ‘Prime Time’ potential – Pulisic at the centre of Allegri’s anti-Juventus plan appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Sacchi praises Allegri’s tactical move and hopes for ‘entertaining’ Juventus-Milan game
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Arrigo Sacchi hopes for an entertaining game between Juventus and AC Milan on Sunday night, and praised a tactical move from Massimiliano Allegri.
